tasks.title: Add session context generator for agent handoff
tasks.description:
When a new agent session starts, generate a concise "catch-up" summary:
- What work was done in the last N sessions
- Current pending tasks sorted by priority
- Recent file changes with semantic summaries
- Key decisions made (from commit messages)

This reduces the 'cold start' problem where agents spend time re-understanding context.

Implementation:
- scripts/session_context.py with SessionContextGenerator class
- Read from tasks/*.json for pending/completed work
- Use git log for recent changes
- Output: markdown summary suitable for agent consumption

tasks.title: Implement state_storage.py (Phase 1 of Task #206)
tasks.description:
Create cortical/state_storage.py with StateWriter and StateLoader classes.
This is Phase 1 of Task #206 (git-friendly pkl replacement).

Key classes:
- StateWriter: serialize layers, connections, computed values to JSON
- StateLoader: load state with hash validation  
- StateManifest: track versions, checksums, staleness

Design follows chunk_index.py pattern:
- Append-only where possible
- Content hashing for change detection
- Split large state into multiple files

Files to create:
- cortical/state_storage.py (main module)
- tests/unit/test_state_storage.py (unit tests)

Leverage existing:
- Minicolumn.to_dict()/from_dict()
- HierarchicalLayer.to_dict()/from_dict()
- ChunkWriter/ChunkLoader patterns

tasks.title: Add progress checkpointing for compute_all()
tasks.description:
When compute_all() runs on large corpora, it can take 10+ minutes.
If the agent session times out, all work is lost.

Solution: Add checkpointing after each major phase:
1. After TF-IDF computation - save partial state
2. After bigram connections - save partial state  
3. After PageRank - save partial state
4. After concepts - save partial state
5. After semantics - final save

Benefits:
- Resume from checkpoint if session times out
- Progress visibility (which phase are we on)
- Partial results usable even if later phases fail

Implementation:
- Add checkpoint_dir parameter to compute_all()
- Save phase completions as JSON markers
- Add resume_from_checkpoint() method

tasks.title: Auto-suggest tasks from code changes
tasks.description:
When code is modified, automatically suggest follow-up tasks:
- Tests added? Suggest running test suite
- New public method? Suggest adding docstring
- Performance-sensitive code changed? Suggest profiling
- Validation logic changed? Suggest checking all related tests

Uses the semantic understanding from Cortical to identify patterns.

Implementation:
- scripts/suggest_tasks.py
- Hook into git pre-commit or post-commit
- Output task suggestions in merge-friendly format
